trans-unit.source: The exception that occurs when an error condition prevents the accessing or creation of a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintServer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当错误条件阻止访问时出现的异常或创建<xref href="System.Printing.PrintServer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION]1> 类内<xref:System.Printing>命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref>提供特定的错误条件的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述错误条件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref> class that provides specific <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref>提供特定的类<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is protected.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数进行保护。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 需序列化或反序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The context, including source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 上下文，包括源和目标的序列化流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition, including the underlying cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref>类，该类提供特定的错误条件，包括基础导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述错误条件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The underlying error condition that caused the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基本错误条件导致<xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref> class that provides a specific error code, error condition, and print server name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref>提供特定的错误代码、 错误条件和打印服务器名称的类。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that is interpreted as an HRESULT, a coded numerical value that is assigned to a specific exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>，将被解释为一个 HRESULT，一个分配给特定异常的编码数字值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述错误条件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The name of the print server that was being accessed when the error condition occurred.
trans-unit.target: 打印时出现错误条件正在访问的服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref> class that provides a specific print server name, error code, and error condition, including the underlying cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref>类，该类提供特定的打印服务器名称、 错误代码和错误条件，包括基础导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that is interpreted as an HRESULT, a coded numerical value that is assigned to a specific exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>，将被解释为一个 HRESULT，一个分配给特定异常的编码数字值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述错误条件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The name of the print server that was being accessed when the error condition occurred.
trans-unit.target: 打印时出现错误条件正在访问的服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: The underlying condition that caused the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基础条件导致<xref href="System.Printing.PrintServerException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data that is used to serialize the object and gets the context of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于序列化对象并获取序列化流的上下文的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data that is used to serialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The context, including source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 上下文，包括源和目标的序列化流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the print server that was being accessed when the exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 获取抛出异常时正在访问的打印服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that names the print server.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>命名打印服务器。</xref:System.String>
